FuncDef:
The qos link-adjustment remote enable command enables the last-mile QoS function.
The undo qos link-adjustment remote enable command disables the last-mile QoS function.
By default, the last-mile QoS function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can configure the last-mile QoS function (remote packet adjustment value) only after enabling the last-mile QoS by running the qos link-adjustment remote enable command.
If the qos link-adjustment remote enable command is configured in the AAA domain view, the last-mile QoS function takes effect on only L2TP services.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
